body: Link to view Link to Image Link to SVG Copy Image Download PNG Download SVG      mermaid.initialize({startOnLoad:false}); $(function(){ console.log("2023-03-04 02:51:34") var blockID = "mermaideditorcontainer0"; var input = document.getElementById(blockID); var output = document.getElementById(blockID+'Output'); var svg = null input.onkeyup = function() { mermaid.mermaidAPI.render('theGraph', input.value, function(svgCode) { output.innerHTML = svgCode; svg = output.querySelector('svg'); }); } function loadImage(url, onload) { var img = new Image(); img.onload = onload; img.crossOrigin="anonymous"; img.src = url; return img; } $('#'+blockID+'DownloadPNG').click(function(){ console.log('click DownloadPNG.') }); $('#'+blockID+'LinkToView').click(function(){ var svgData = new XMLSerializer().serializeToString(svg); var blob = new Blob([svgData], { type: 'image/svg+xml' }); var win = window.URL || window.webkitURL || window; var url = win.createObjectURL(blob); var _img = loadImage(url, function(){ var imgH=_img.height; var imgW=_img.width; var scaleBy = 2; const scale = window.devicePixelRatio*2; var _canvas = document.createElement('canvas'); _canvas.width = imgW*scaleBy; _canvas.height = imgH*scaleBy; _canvas.style.width = imgW+"px" ; _canvas.style.hight = imgH+"px"; var _ctx = _canvas.getContext("2d"); _ctx.drawImage(_img, 0, 0); console.log(_canvas.toDataURL('image/png')) }); }); })  To learn more about Mermaid
title: Markdown Mermaid
